name: Vegan Kumquat Creamsicle Smoothie
description: This dairy-free creamsicle smoothie (think Orange Julius with a little more oomph) uses puréed whole kumquats for the citrus component.
totalTime: 5 minutes, plus an overnight soak for the cashews
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup cashews soaked overnight in a bowl of water at room temeperature
Seeds from one fresh vanilla bean

recipeInstructions.text: Add the kumquats, cashews, and almond milk to the blender and blend on high speed until the mixture is creamy, about 2 minutes.
Add the frozen mango chunks and vanilla bean seeds and pulse a few times to break up the mango, then blend until smooth, about 1 minute longer. Sweeten to taste with agave nectar. Serve.
